item.description: Tank Truck Fire; INC#0065; 02:14AM; 6500 N Canoga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qoV3Er; Canoga Park; A passenger vehicle collided into a tanker truck then careened into a fountain and erupted into flames. The occupant of the vehicle was determined deceased on scene (age/gender unknown). The tanker spilled an estimated 1,000 gallons of fuel. There are no other injuries reported. The tanker spill is a static situation (no fire involved). Firefighters have secured the area and are working contain any run off. There is a full road closure at Victory and Canoga and this area will remain closed for an indefinite time period as private contractors respond to remove the fuel / tanker truck. Any questions regarding the collision are referring to law enforcement, LAPD Inc# 0153. Original 9-1-1 call received at 1:00AM. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC17 E104 E287 E293 E305 E87 E93 RA105 RA87 RA872 SQ87 T105 T87 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1891; 12:08AM; 15033 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FifjvL; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 75 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 20 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene through the night for overhaul operations. Please avoid the area due to the heavy presence of fire apparatus and hose lines. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC10 BC14 BC5 BC9 CM42 E102 E108 E235 E239 E288 E289 E290 E83 E87 E89 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 HE1 HR3 RA88 RA89 T35 T39 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1891; 11:54PM; 15033 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FifjvL; Sherman Oaks; Firefighters have made good progress against the deeply seated fire. They have extinguished the fire from the interior of the structure but are still battling stubborn pockets of fire within the attic (this area is harder to reach in the defensive posture). There are no other structures threatened and no injuries reported. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation, per protocol for a fire of this size.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC10 BC14 BC5 BC9 CM42 E102 E108 E235 E239 E288 E289 E290 E83 E87 E89 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 HE1 HR3 RA88 RA89 T35 T39 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Structure Fire Updated Address 01/12/2022 INC#1891

item.description: Update Updated Address Structure Fire; INC#1891; 10:48PM; 15033 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FifjvL; Sherman Oaks; This incident is at the Greater Alarm status with 75 firefighters assigned. Due to the well-developed fire and questionable roof integrity, the Incident Commander has transitioned to a Defensive operation. There are approximately five separate businesses in this strip mall. The exposed building on the Bravo (west) side has been defended from any damage. There are downed, charged powerlines on the Charlie (north) side of the structure. No injuries reported.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC5 BC9 CM42 E102 E108 E235 E239 E288 E289 E290 E83 E87 E89 E99 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA88 RA89 T35 T39 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1891; 10:48PM; 15000 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K7qQBB; Sherman Oaks; one story strip mall with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested (reflected in this alert). ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E102 E239 E288 E290 E83 E99 RA88 T39 T88 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#1382; 04:57PM; 9403 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fUiXRN; Sun Valley; Multiple cars (estimated 7) on fire at an auto yard. No structures threatened at this time. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E24 E289 E77 T89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:25AM; 3116 W Rowena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HXPF14; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 21 firefighters extinguished the auto fires in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. Their quick actions prevented the fire from extending into the exposed apartment building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E482 E56 E82 RA35 RA835 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:11AM; 3116 W Rowena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HXPF14; Los Feliz; Multiple (reports of three) autos in a carport fully involved in fire. Fire attack is addressing the vehicles while additional firefighters are investigating to determine if there is any extension into the exposed, two story apartment building.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E482 E56 E82 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1615; 08:38PM; 1931 W 22nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nejPFh; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 72 firefighters battled heavy fire in a one story single family dwelling with full attic involvement and multiple trees/vegetation to the rear of the structure. Full extinguishment was achieved in 50 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the exposed buildings (on two sides). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E294 E34 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA826 RA829 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29 T3 UR3 ; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1615; 07:48PM; 1931 S La Salle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tg7X9G; Harvard Heights; One story, single family dwelling and detached garage with heavy fire and multiple additional buildings exposed. There are also trees (number unknown) on fire. Three additional task forces requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E11 E13 E215 E226 E29 RA13 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
